entries.title_d: Escort the scanner safely through the system
entries.title: Yavin System: Escort the Deep Space Scan Ship
entries.thanks_2: They will send more, I can feel it.
entries.taunt_5: Were you looking for me RSF fools?
entries.taunt_4: Were you looking for me RSF fools?
entries.taunt_3: Were you looking for me RSF fools?
entries.taunt_2: This job is going to be the death of you.
entries.taunt_1: Were you looking for me RSF fools?
entries.split_quest_alert: \#pcontrast3 We are sending in an attack force based on the findings from our scanner.  They will need you even more this time, Black Sun activity has been non stop since our last encounter. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.reason_5: We need to finish this route, command is counting on it.
entries.reason_4: We need to finish this route, command is counting on it.
entries.reason_3: We need to finish this route, command is counting on it.
entries.reason_2: We need to finish this route, command is counting on it.
entries.reason_1: We need to finish this route, command is counting on it.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet with the ship to be escorted
entries.quest_location_d: A patrol route in the Yavin System
entries.quest_escort_d: Keep this ship safe as they make their rounds.
entries.goodbye_5: That is all we need, jumping out now.
entries.goodbye_4: That is all we need, jumping out now.
entries.goodbye_3: That is all we need, jumping out now.
entries.goodbye_2: That is all we need, jumping out now.
entries.goodbye_1: That is all we need, jumping out now.
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 RSF Command: < \#pcontrast1 We are sending in a scanner to locate the remainder of their forces.  If we are able to pin point them we can concentrate our efforts.  Uploading a rendezvous point to you now. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: You have failed to protect the scanner vessle.
entries.failed_destroy: You have failed due to the scanner being destroyed.
entries.complete: \#pcontrast3 RSF Scanner Ship: < \#pcontrast1 Located concentration of Black Sun fighters, notifying command. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Enemy craft detected on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Designated rendezvous point reached. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: You have failed the mission because you aborted.
